channel.title: [Allstar Source] - NPC Drops And NPC Attack You
channel.description:
Hi, Im using Allstar Source, yeh i know a bit old but i like the source VERY much lmao :P Annyway...
I have this small problem :o, I want to change the drops for my NPC's and i want to make Some NPC's to attack you like Jad does, Just run up to you then attack.
I have the file "npcdrops.cfg".. what else do i need? and how do i make NPC's attack me (I Have no clue acually ;D) :D
My "npcdrop.cfg" look like this: (just the first 2 lines) [code] //--------NPCID-----DropType-----Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 npcdrop = 23 2 1203 1 882 7 [/code]
Ty for answers :)

item.title: [Allstar Source] - NPC Drops And NPC Attack You
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

[quote=“adog17x, post:2, topic:277900”]Olawd,
the npcdrops.cfg doesn’t work for crap, you’re gonna have to get a new drop system (search) ll.[/quote]

Hmm… How do i put in an new drop system? :S Lol… ;D

Read full topic

item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

Hi, Im using Allstar Source, yeh i know a bit old but i like the source VERY much lmao
Annyway…

I have this small problem :o, I want to change the drops for my NPC’s and i want to make Some NPC’s to attack you like Jad does, Just run up to you then attack.

I have the file “npcdrops.cfg”… what else do i need?
and how do i make NPC’s attack me (I Have no clue acually ;D)

My “npcdrop.cfg” look like this: (just the first 2 lines)

//--------NPCID-----DropType-----Item----Amount--
npcdrop = 1		1		6529	3	6529	4
npcdrop = 23		2		1203	1	882	7

Ty for answers
